elements.text: Here's what you missed in <#C01MF4G29UH> over the last 24 hours:
The conversation focused on technical issues and queries related to code syncing, deployment errors, and search filters.

elements.type: <@<@U012YNM8AUQ>> asked about the location of the code that syncs certain directories.
<@<@U034Z67VCKU>> reported a nix error that was preventing a deployment and sought advice on the issue.
<@<@U01T40TS08M>> inquired if there was a way to filter repl searches to only show results from Verified accounts.
